newsitem.title: USA: FRONTIER TO START DENVER-BOSTON FLIGHTS. [CORRECTED 19:45 GMT]
newsitem.headline: FRONTIER TO START DENVER-BOSTON FLIGHTS. [CORRECTED 19:45 GMT]

text.p: Frontier Airlines said it will start flights from its hub in Denver to Boston beginning Sept 16 (Corrects from Sept 11) at fares as low as $139 each way.
Frontier said Monday it will serve Bonston's Logan International Airport with two nonstop flights daily in each direction, using 136-seat, all-coach Boeing 737-700s.
Boston is its first destination in the eastern United States.
